name: Shelly Reef
what_you_do: Shelly Reef works full time as an empath, sound healer, meditation expert, and instructor of the Therapeutic Harp.
who_you_serve: Shelly's mission is to awaken inner joy and compassion in the hearts of as many fellow humans as possible.
social_proof: Shelly has lectured on the topics of integrative healthcare, sound healing, and meditation at New York University, Tze Shan Monastery in Hong Kong, AsiaSpa Awards, and many more.
signature_programs: Shelly is the author of the soon-to-be-released book, "The Immeasurable".
business_focus: Shelly Reef works as an empath, sound healer, meditation expert, and instructor of the Therapeutic Harp.
service_provided: empathic readings, workshops, sound healing, meditation instruction, therapeutic harp instruction
